official-title.#text:
To authorize the placement at the former Navy Dive School
		  at the Washington Navy Yard of a memorial to honor the members of the Armed
		  Forces who have served as divers and whose service in defense of the United
		  States has been carried out beneath the waters of the world.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

committee-name.#tail: , and in addition to the Committee on

, for a
			 period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for
			 consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the
			 committee concerned

short-title.#text:
Man in the Sea Memorial
			 Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Establishment of
			 military divers memorial at Washington Navy Yard

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 2855 of the National Defense
			 Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2013
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2013/s:2855

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may permit a
			 third party to establish and maintain, at a suitable location at the former
			 Navy Dive School at the Washington Navy Yard in the District of Columbia, a
			 memorial to honor the members of the United States Armed Forces who have served
			 as divers and whose service in defense of the United States has been carried
			 out beneath the waters of the world.

text.#text:
Consistent with
			 the sense of the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
and the final design of the memorial shall be subject to the approval of
			 the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Man in the Sea Memorial Act/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
. In selecting the site to serve as the location for the memorial,
			 the Secretary shall seek to maximize visitor access to the memorial.

text.#text:
The actual
			 location at the Washington Navy Yard for the memorial authorized by

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall
			 provide military ceremonial support at the dedication of the memorial
			 authorized by

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Man in the Sea Memorial Act/s:2/ss:a
Man in the Sea Memorial Act/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may accept and expend
			 contributions of non-Federal funds and resources for such purposes.

text.#text:
Federal
			 funds may not be used to design, procure, prepare, install, or maintain the
